microservices.name: MS1
microservices.description: After producing two cars with alphanumeric designations, Lamborghini once again turned to the bull breeder for inspiration.

microservices.name: MS2
microservices.description: Don Eduardo was filled with pride when he learned that Ferruccio had named a car for his family and their line of bulls.

microservices.name: MS3
microservices.description: The automaker would continue to draw upon the bullfighting connection in future years.

microservices.name: MS4
microservices.description: After World War II, Lamborghini opened a garage in Pieve di Cento.

microservices.name: MS5
microservices.description: In his spare time, Lamborghini modified an old Fiat Topolino he had purchased.
